text: Nabiyow ama koroosite mara Naayootat deedal kee anqasah giirisah ken table waqdi, tokkel derre keenit cabaay keenik exxer ama yaabak kalah aka yaabat yabba iyyaanam fanah, sheytan uma yaabat yaaba marâ luk daffeyaanam waaso lem koo hawweenisek, toysa tamah kassittek lakal daalimiinih yan marâ luk madaffen
